author: ShadyTidus
description: Community Wiki Helper with slash command support: LFG system with game detection, hosting guidelines, D&D info, rule explanations, and moderation tools. Role-based authorization required.
install_msg: Thanks for installing the Wiki Cog! Use slash commands: `/lfg`, `/host`, `/biweekly`, `/rule`, `/wow`, `/fafo`, `/hosted`. Prefix commands also available. Requires authorized roles to use.
name: wiki
short: Wiki helper with slash commands and LFG system.
